articles.title: NDC Investigation Group's Spokesman Ridicules Confrontation Farce in S. Korea
articles.content:
NDC Investigation Group's Spokesman Ridicules Confrontation Farce in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Investigation Group of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK Saturday released a statement to denounce the south Korean puppet group of traitors for staging "confrontation events" in the sea and land and sky on the lapse of six years since the warship Cheonan sinking incident.
					 The south Korean authorities are still insisting that the warship Cheonan "was sunk by the north" in a bid to stir up distrust, hostility, confrontation and conflict, the statement noted, adding that this is sophism which can never work on anyone and unpardonable provocation.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 Lurking behind Park Geun Hye and her group's persistent insistence on the above-said claim though the truth of which was fully disclosed is a sinister intention to turn the inter-Korean relations into those of hostility and confrontation which can never be repaired.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye puppet group will remain unchanged in its inveterate bad habit as it has asserted that all past incidents in the south "were caused by the north".
					
					 The group is beating "the drum of confrontation" more noisily regardless of time while making such burlesques "annual" and "regular." This row is more unpardonable in view of the prevailing situation.
					
					 Extreme provocation is bound to bring about a counteraction of justice.
					
					 The U.S. and its stooges are seeking to "bring down the social system" of the DPRK, pursuant to harsh "sanctions" and unprecedented military provocation against it. Such actions will spark a deadly retaliatory battle.
					
					 If the Park group shamelessly persists in the confrontation racket against the fellow countrymen in the north, floating "fiction about the warship Cheonan sinking incident by the north," the whole land of south Korea will not escape the same fate as that of Cheonan.

articles.title: KPA Long-range Artillery Force Sends Ultimatum to Park Geun Hye Group
articles.content:
KPA Long-range Artillery Force Sends Ultimatum to Park Geun Hye Group
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The recent simultaneous firings conducted by the long-range artillery force of the Korean People's Army, rocking the earth and sky, turned the imaginary enemy bases of provocation into a sea of flames in a flash. This was a great eruption of its irrepressible hatred and wrath at the enemy which committed the thrice-cursed act of daring attempt to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. It was, at the same time, the beginning of the merciless retaliatory campaign to put the most miserable end to the Park Geun Hye group of south Korea.
					 The long-range artillery force of the large combined unit of the KPA on the front sent the following ultimatum to the Park Geun Hye group Saturday:
					
					 1. The thrice-cursed traitor Park and her group should make an official apology to all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad for daring commit high treason.
					
					 Our dignified sun of Songun represents the life and destiny of all Koreans and their rosy future.
					
					 It is the worst crime never to be pardoned in the world to dare attempt to slander and do harm to the sun.
					
					 The Park group should apologize to all Koreans. This will be the last and the best way for it to spend its remaining days.
					
					 2. Park Geun Hye, traitor without an equal in the world, and her group should mete out the severest punishment to the worst criminals at once as they mapped out the thrice-cursed "operation for striking the leadership" and dreamed of its implementation and finish them off without mercy on behalf of all Koreans.
					
					 If there is a sin which must not be committed as a human being in the world, it is a foolish act to do harm to the sun in the sky.
					
					 Neither excuse nor evasion of responsibility is allowed for such high treason. It only deserves the severest punishment of Heaven.
					
					 Put them to death in the eyes of all fellow countrymen. This would be the last opportunity for the Chongwadae, cesspool of evils, and reactionary ruling machines to escape baptism of retaliatory fire.
					
					 3. If matchless traitor Park Geun Hye and her group do not respond to the ultimatum of the KPA, the long-range artillery force of the KPA large combined unit on the front will move over to merciless military action. 
					
					 Public apology and punishment are the ultimatum of the long-range artillery force of the KPA which keeps the Chongwadae and the reactionary ruling machines within the firing range and waits for an order for a preemptive strike to punish the enemies.
					
					 If the force is just a click away from pushing the button for intensive strike, the enemy's positions that produced all evils and tragedies of confrontation between compatriots and national division will turn into ashes in a moment.
					
					 No matter how busy Park and her group may go, talking about the "strengthening of guard posture across south Korea" and "urgent meeting of operational officers", this would get them nowhere.
					
					 The only way out for them is to sincerely accept the ultimatum of the KPA.
					
					 They should always remember that the Chongwadae and the reactionary ruling machines are within the intensive striking range of the long-range artillery force of the KPA large combined unit on the front.
					
					 What the Paektusan army says is not hot air.

articles.title: Spokesman for C.C., GFTUK Assails U.S. and S. Korean Authorities' Reckless Moves
articles.content:
Spokesman for C.C., GFTUK Assails U.S. and S. Korean Authorities' Reckless Moves
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) in a statement on Saturday vehemently condemned on behalf of all the workers the U.S. imperialists and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors of south Korea for their heinous moves to get the sun eclipsed, not content with running amuck in the reckless moves to invade the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 If the enemies ignite a war, the DPRK's working class will join the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army in the battle to blow up the den of the Park's regime, liberate the southern part of Korea and build a new society for the working people there, tightly holding arms of the revolution instead of hammer.
					
					 The world will see how the service personnel and people of the DPRK including the working class firmly rallied behind the outstanding Songun brilliant commander punish the provocateurs who have committed the shuddering acts against the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and win the final victory in the confrontation with the U.S. and a great war for national reunification.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists, the sworn enemy, and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors will pay a dear price for the high treason committed against the Korean people.

articles.title: Spokesman for KSDP Central Committee Calls for All-people Sacred Struggle
articles.content:
Spokesman for KSDP Central Committee Calls for All-people Sacred War
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Korean Social Democratic Party (KSDP) in a statement Saturday branded the last-ditch provocation of the U.S. imperialists and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors of south Korea as the most vicious and outrageous hostile act against the dignity and social system of the DPRK and an unprecedented hideous criminal act of daring challenge the sun of the nation.
					 The statement said:
					
					 There is no such country in the world as the single-mindedly united DPRK advancing toward a bright future, a society where the people believe in their leader as in Heaven and their leader regards his faithful service to them as the basis of his politics. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the puppet forces are making desperate efforts to bring down the most sacred and valuable mainstay of the destiny of the Korean people.
					
					 If the enemies show even the slight sign to mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK, its service personnel and people will make a preemptive deadly strike at them and reduce all cesspools of crimes to ashes.
					
					 We will turn out in the all-people sacred struggle for devotedly defending the sun of the destiny, wipe out the aggressors to the last man and achieve the final victory in the decisive battle against the U.S. and the historic cause of national reunification without fail.

articles.title: Information Bureau of AINDF Central Committee Releases Appeal to South Koreans
articles.content:
Information Bureau of AINDF Central Committee Releases Appeal to South Koreans
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The Information Bureau of the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) released an appeal to south Koreans on Thursday with the approach of the south Korean puppet National Assembly election, according to the website Kuguk Jonson.
					 The present tragic situation in south Korea clearly proves that it is impossible to get rid of the misfortune and sufferings of the people and protect the destiny of the nation and their vital rights as long as Park Geun Hye is allowed to go scot-free, the appeal said, and went on:
					
					 The 20th "general election" is a final court for punishing the Park Geun Hye group for having imposed unprecedented misfortune and sacrifices upon the people through vicious confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north, fascist dictatorship and worst depravity and incompetence and a decisive battlefield between patriotism and treachery, between reunification and division and between democracy and "yusin" fascism.
					
					 Park Geun Hye and the "Saenuri Party" are the targets to be eliminated through the "general election" without fail as they sold off national dignity and interests to outside forces and is going hectic to gain their wealth and honor.
					
					 Now is the crucial time to bury the Park group in the cemetery of history as it has worked hard to plunge the nation into the disaster of a nuclear war, pushing the people to the brink of death.
					
					 All the people should turn out in the upcoming 20th "general election" and surely open up new horizon for independence, democracy and reunification by inheriting the tradition of April 19, May 18 and June fierce popular resistance which dealt heavy blows at the pro-U.S. military dictatorial regimes and recorded brilliant chapters in the national democratic movement.

articles.title: Information Bureau of AINDF Central Committee Releases Slogans on "General Election" in S. Korea
articles.content:
Information Bureau of AINDF Central Committee Releases Slogans on "General Election" in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The Information Bureau of the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) released slogans on Thursday as regards the south Korean puppet National Assembly election, according to the website Kuguk Jonson.
					 The slogans called for severely punishing Park Geun Hye, the sworn enemy of democracy, nation and people, and the "Saenuri Party" through voting.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 Let's not turn back on politics, though it is dirty, but bring about a drastic change in Youido political landscape by positively taking part in the election.
					
					 Let's turn all the polling stations into theaters of all-people anti-U.S. actions and platforms for condemning the thrice-cursed crimes of Park Geun Hye and the candidates from the "Saenuri Party."
					
					 Let's check and foil the U.S. cunning moves to interfere in the election.
					
					 Let's vote for those candidates who respect the June 15 and October 4 declarations and call for national reconciliation,d cooperation and peace.
					
					 Noting that the success or failure in the election depends on how to achieve solidarity and alliance and choose unified candidates, the slogans called for winning a victory in unity.

articles.title: National Reconciliation Council Reveals Park Geun Hye's Crimes
articles.content:
National Reconciliation Council Reveals Park Geun Hye's Crimes
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The National Reconciliation Council Saturday released an indictment disclosing traitor Park Geun Hye's thrice-cursed crimes against the nation and people, citing only part of so many ill fames she earned from the south Korean people.
					 The indictment said it is the present trend of the south Korean society to ridicule and disclose all sorts of traitorous, unpopular and inhuman crimes Park Geun Hye has committed during three years of her office, satirizing her ugly names.
					
					 Noting that the old witch Park has a lot of bad names for her crimes, the indictment went on:
					
					 Commonly people have pet names and nicknames, but the world does not know such despicable and bad names as Park's.
					
					 All the bad names of Park reflect thrice-cursed crimes she has committed against the country and the nation and the nation's curse, denunciation and anger at her.
					
					 South Korean people call her Lee Myung Bak type Geun Hye as she has brought the inter-Korean relations to collapse just as Lee did. She is also called Pal Kkun-hae meaning an old woman with cold heart as she has frozen the north-south relations.
					
					 She is, at the same time, called Pa Ku-ne meaning a capricious old woman who changes whatever she doesn't like, Ppo Kun-hae meaning all south Koreans feel distressed under her rule and chicken-like woman as she tirelessly cries out for confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					
					 She is also called dirty old woman because she is going to sell off the fellow countrymen, not content with providing sex to various partners and selling off the country. South Koreans call her cobra-like Geun Hye as all her fervor and affection are quelled by poison. They also call her dog-like Guen Hye because she likes dogs more than human beings and evil-minded Guen Hye as she does everything evil.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Visits Steel Complexes
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Visits Steel Complexes
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex and the Chollima Steel Complex.
					 Looking round various places of the iron and steel complex, he encouraged the workers in their drive for hitting an all-time high in the production of Juche iron.
					
					 A follow-up consultative meeting discussed matters of upholding the Party Central Committee with increased steel production by learning from the heroic fighting spirit of the preceding generations and boosting the steel output.
					
					 Going round the steel complex, he called for increasing iron and steel production in the spirit of self-reliance and self-development.

articles.title: DPRK Students Turn Out in Struggle for National Reunification
articles.content:
DPRK Students Turn Out in Struggle for National Reunification
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- Students in the DPRK are now stirred up over the news that the Korean People's Army staged a large-scale intensive striking drill of long-range artillery pieces aimed at destruction of the Chongwadae and other reactionary ruling machines in Seoul of south Korea, in reaction to its puppet forces' hideous provocation.
					 At the instigation of the U.S. imperialists, the Park Geun Hye group of traitors in south Korea staged a "precision striking drill" aimed to destroy the office of the DPRK supreme leadership on March 21. Such action triggered off the DPRK citizens' towering anger all at once.
					
					 The recent intensive striking drill of the KPA shows the DPRK people's strong will for retaliation and it serves as an ultimatum to the provokers, Pak Song Chol, chairman of the Kim Il Sung University Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, told KCNA, adding:
					
					 Many students of the university have volunteered to rejoin or join the KPA. If a military operation to liberate the southern part of Korea is launched, all students will act political activists in south Korea as the university students did during the last Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Pang Sung Son, principal of Pyongyang Secondary School No. 1, said:
					
					 All graduates of the school are now petitioning for military service, instead of admission to universities.
					
					 If a war to liberate the southern part of the country is unleashed, the U.S. imperialists and the Park Geun Hye group will never go scot-free.
					
					 Kim Chol Gwang, a student of Ri Chol Min Senior Secondary School, said:
					
					 To achieve the national reunification is what the Korean people have had long desired. It brooks no further delay.
					
					 It is needless to give any warning or prior notice to the group of fanatics hell-bent on war drills. Only preemptive attack of our own style is needed to root out the evils.

articles.title: DPRK People Urge Attack on Provokers
articles.content:
DPRK People Urge Attack on Provokers
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- All citizens in the DPRK are very glad to hear the news that large combined units of the Korean People's Army on the front staged an intensive striking drill of long-range artillery pieces to blow up the Chongwadae and the reactionary ruling machines in Seoul of south Korea.
					 Kim Kyong Il, a worker of the Kim Jong Thae Electric Locomotive Complex, told KCNA: It is high time that a shower of gunfire was inflicted on the south Korean group of traitors who dared stage a "precision strike drill" aimed to destroy the office of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, at the instigation of the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 Ri Kang San, a worker of the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex, said:
					
					 Their provocations have gone beyond the tolerance limit. Such hideous provocation should never be pardoned.
					
					 My decision is to join the KPA going in attack to wipe out the provokers to the last man.
					
					 Jo Sok Chol, a section chief of the IT Sci-Tech Institute under the State Academy of Sciences, stressed the need for the KPA to make nuclear attack on the U.S. imperialists and their followers at once. 
					
					 Ri Yong Jin, a sub-workteam head of the Saenal Co-op Farm in Sinchon County, South Hwanghae Province, said: Now is the time for us to take our pent-up vengeance for those innocent children and mothers massacred in the county by the enemy during the last war. My strong desire is to rejoin the army and take arms in my hand so as to annihilate all the provokers.
					
					 Pak Yong Bom, a workshop head at the Ranam Coal Mining Machine Complex, noted that he wrote to his son serving in the army to shower fire of revenge on the provokers without mercy.

articles.title: Mangyongdae Prize Int'l Marathon to Be Held in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Mangyongdae Prize Int'l Marathon to Be Held in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The Mangyongdae Prize International Marathon will be held in Pyongyang with the approach of the Day of the Sun, the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Apr. 15).
					 In this regard, Kang Song Du, secretary of the Korean Athletics Association, told KCNA:
					
					 The marathon, slated for April 10, is divided into 42.195 km, 21.0975 km and 10 km categories. Its opening and closing ceremonies are to take place at the May Day Stadium.
					
					 It will bring together selected marathoners of the DPRK and marathoners and fans from other countries and regions.
					
					 Its course includes Rungna Bridge, Kumrung Tunnel, the Arch of Triumph, Kumrung Tunnel No.2 and Chongryu Bridge.
					
					 This event serves as a good occasion in celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung as a holiday common to humankind and deepening friendship among sportspersons and fans of various countries while developing marathon technique.

articles.title: CNA-resistant Steel Produced in DPRK
articles.content:
CNA-resistant Steel Produced in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The Material Institute under Kim Chaek University of Technology in the DPRK succeeded in realizing the local production of steel resistant to concentrated nitric acid (CNA) in high temperature.
					 This kind of steel is made with pure iron at an induction furnace by means of alloyage.
					
					 Its field trial showed that it still maintains its acid-resistant property even in high-temperature concentrated nitric acid. The stainless steel is equal in mechanical properties to the international standardized one.
					
					 Through a process of putting its production on an industrial basis, the Institute made a breakthrough in producing very low-carbon special stainless steel.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Ridicules U.S. Scared by DPRK's Fire of Large-Caliber Multiple Rocket Launching System
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Ridicules U.S. Scared by DPRK's Fire of Large-Caliber Multiple Rocket Launching System
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is terming the DPRK's recent fire of the new type large-caliber multiple rocket launching system the "short-range missile launch" and violation of the UN "resolution".
					 As soon as the DPRK's new type weapon fire was reported on March 21, the south Korean puppet forces claimed that the "north launched a short-range projectile" and the special representative of the U.S. Department of State for Korea policy, a spokesman for the U.S. Department of State for the East Asian and Pacific Affairs and a spokesman for the U.S. Defense Department vied with each other in blustering that the "missile launch by use of the ballistic missile-firing technology is a clear violation of the UN Security Council's resolution" and "north Korea should refrain from escalating tension and focus on taking detailed measures for keeping international promise and duty".
					
					 The U.S. is now taken aback by the DPRK's tremendous military muscle.
					
					 Even the president of the U.S. Institute for Science and International Security was astonished at the DPRK's opening to public of its miniaturized and standardized nuclear warheads, saying that "north Korea might have already had the capability of miniaturizing nuclear warheads".
					
					 Commenting on the drill for the ballistic rocket launch staged by the Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army, the U.S. said that the "separated warhead successfully exploded at the preset altitude after it reentered the atmosphere, resisting the friction heat" and "nuclear explosion might occur in the sky over the Korean peninsula, rendering all electronic systems dysfunctional". This reminds one of a saying a scalded dog fears cold water. It also seems the U.S. has become so nervous as to mistake the thunder for the nuclear explosion as it failed to discern the ballistic missile fire and multiple rocket launching system fire.
					
					 The U.S. has deployed all sorts of strategic and tactical nuclear weapons in south Korea after calculating that its persistent unprecedented and heinous policy of blockading the DPRK would prevent the latter from bolstering its strength.
					
					 Its wild dream went up in smoke and very expensive weapons turned into scrap iron in the face of the DPRK's H-bomb test and showing off of its military muscle through ballistic rocket fire.
					
					 The deployment of the multiple rocket launching system is like a horrible nightmare for the U.S. as the system is of great strategic significance in remarkably increasing the capabilities of the Korean People's Army in mounting precision attacks on the enemies' targets in the operational theater in the southern part of Korea.
					
					 The U.S. ridiculous and hysterical behavior just stems from its horror of the DPRK.
					
					 If the U.S. fears the DPRK so much, the former should have withdrawn all its military hardware from south Korea and stopped joint military drills for aggression.
					
					 The U.S. desperate efforts for finding other recipe for curing its hysteria will only invite criticism and denunciation by the world people and self-ruin.
					
					 The DPRK can never allow the U.S. to unreasonably find fault with the former out of inveterate repugnance.
					
					 The U.S. is staging the nuclear war drills targeting the DPRK while openly revealing its ulterior intention to do harm to the dignity of the supreme leadership and social system of the latter even by throwing away its mask of "annual and defensive exercises". This makes the international community believe that the U.S. is, indeed, the arch criminal escalating tension.
					
					 Whenever the DPRK takes military countermeasures, the U.S. is slandering the former by raking all stooges.
					
					 This is aimed to shift the blame for the escalating tension on the Korean peninsula on to the DPRK by intentionally and persistently pulling it up and label it as the "violator of international law".
					
					 The DPRK's recent measures are due ones for self-defense to stand up against the U.S. which is staging a series of military acts aiming at the former's headquarters by mobilizing the largest number of aggression troops and strategic assets in history.
					
					 The U.S. cannot label the DPRK's toughest countermeasures for safeguarding the sovereignty and right to existence of the country and the nation as illegal ones nor can it conceal its criminal nature.
					
					 Unless the U.S. drops its nuclear threat and blackmail and hostile policy toward the DPRK, the latter will take stronger measures for self-defense to cope with them.

articles.title: Newspapers on True Colors of Provocateurs Disclosed by Warship Cheonan Sinking Incident
articles.content:
Newspapers on True Colors of Provocateurs Disclosed by Warship Cheonan Sinking Incident
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers here today lash out at the south Korean puppet group for holding an event for "commemorating" the so-called "day of defending the West Sea" in Taejon on the occasion of the sixth anniversary of the warship Cheonan sinking incident.
					 The newspapers say that the warship Cheonan sinking incident was a hideous case and a heinous provocation against the DPRK, unprecedented in history, cooked up by the south Korean puppet group to check the improvement of the north-south relations and ignite a war against the north. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says in an article that the above-said incident was a product of the deliberate and premeditated plots hatched by the U.S. master and its stooges engrossed in confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Fraud and fabrication are the confrontation maniacs' mode of existence.
					
					 Whenever a shocking incident happened in south Korea, the puppet group groundlessly linked it with the DPRK and kicked up anti-DPRK confrontational hysteria.
					
					 The group of traitors has remained unchanged for the past six years in hatching plots and perpetrating provocations against the DPRK.
					
					 The prevailing grave situation clearly proves that the puppet group is getting frantic in its moves to ignite a nuclear war at any cost, backed by the U.S., in order to realize its wild ambition to invade the north.
					
					 Minju Joson says in a commentary that the invaders and provocateurs are calling on "all people to rally for security" while talking about someone's "provocation." This is aimed to conceal their confrontational nature and instill the hysteria for invading the north into the soldiers of the puppet army and south Korean people and thus use them as bullet shields and canon fodder in the battle against compatriots just as those soldiers met miserable deaths in the warship Cheonan sinking incident and shelling on Yonphyong Island, it added.

articles.title: S. Korean People Oppose Removal of Statue of Girl Sexual Slave
articles.content:
S. Korean People Oppose Removal of Statue of Girl Sexual Slave
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- Victims of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and members of civic and public organizations in south Korea held the 1223rd Wednesday rally outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul on March 23 in protest against the moves to remove the statue of girl sexual slave, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 They disclosed that shortly ago Japanese media reported Japan's intention not to give a billion yen to a foundation for supporting former comfort women unless the girl statue in front of the Japanese embassy is removed.
					
					 They denounced the south Korean authorities' humiliating behavior to set up a foundation with a petty amount of money given by Japan.
					
					 They declared their will to protect the girl statue at any cost, demanding official apology and legal reparation from the Japanese government for the sexual slavery.

articles.title: Juvenile Crimes Rife in S. Korea
articles.content:
Juvenile Crimes Rife in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- South Korean CBS reported that a son in his 20s killed with a lethal weapon his father who scolded him for being absorbed in computer games in Songnam City of Kyonggi Province of south Korea on March 23.
					 According to an opinion poll, respondents said juveniles committing crimes in back alleys or parks are the worst insecure elements.

articles.title: Misogamy Increases in S. Korea
articles.content:
Misogamy Increases in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- Misogamy is increasing among the young south Korean people.
					 According to the puppet Agency of Statistics on Thursday, marriage among the young south Korean people in January reduced 15.8 percent as against the same month of last year.
					
					 Misogamy reduces the rate of child delivery, sparking off deep social concern.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Costa Rica
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Costa Rica
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- A Costa Rican preparatory committee for celebrating President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun) was formed on March 16.
					 Jose Francisco Aguilar Bulgarelli, honorary chairman of the Latin American Institute of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Sweden
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Sweden
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- A Swedish preparatory committee for celebrating President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun) was formed in Stockholm, Sweden on March 20.
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, and Oskar Molleby, chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events on this occasion.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Tanzania
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Tanzania
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- A Tanzanian national preparatory committee for celebrating President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun) was formed in Dar Es Salaam on March 19.
					 Maina, secretary general of the Tanzania-DPRK Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to arrange political and cultural events praising the President's revolutionary exploits.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by British Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by British Organization on Its Website
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "On the Need for the Koreans in the United States to Unite and Step Up the Movement for National Reunification" was posted by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on its website on March 15. 
					 The work, made public on March 11, Juche 82 (1993), stresses the need to reunify the country by federal formula through the great unity of the whole nation.
					
					 It indicates the ways of achieving the great unity of the whole nation and calls on the Koreans in the U.S. to wage a dynamic struggle for national reunification.

articles.title: Seminars on Kim Il Sung's Exploits Held Abroad
articles.content:
Seminars on Kim Il Sung's Exploits Held Abroad
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the immortal revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung were held in the Czech Republic and Nigeria on March 9 and 10 to mark the Day of the Sun (his birth anniversary).
					 Present at the seminars were figures of the preparatory committee for the Day of the Sun in the Czech Republic, the Czechoslovak Communist Party, the Czech Communist Party-21, the Pribram County Committee of the Communist Party of Czech and Moravia, the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association, the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy and the University of Abuja and masses.
					
					 Zdenek Klimek, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czech Communist Party-21, praised Kim Il Sung as the eternal leader of not only the Korean people but progressive mankind.
					
					 He said that there have been not a few famous statesmen in the world but none of them was so great as Kim Il Sung who led the revolution and construction to victory and glory for such a long period till the advanced age of 80 from his teens with his outstanding thoughts, leadership and noble virtues, enjoying absolute support and trust from the people.
					
					 Josef Servista, deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party, said it would as ever raise the voices of solidarity with the just struggle of the Korean people for the defence of socialism and national reunification.
					
					 Aba Sadik Abubakr, chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of the Juche Philosophy, lauded Kim Il Sung for ushering in the era of independence in which the popular masses emerged masters of history and building a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.

articles.title: Regional Body Supports DPRK's Self-Defensive Measure
articles.content:
Regional Body Supports DPRK's Self-Defensive Measure
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions in a statement on March 20 condemned the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces' Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The above-said largest-ever joint military drills targeting the DPRK are aimed to do harm to the supreme headquarters of the DPRK and mount a nuclear strike on it.
					
					 The world progressive forces such as the International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions are bitterly denouncing the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces for their dangerous moves for aggression.
					
					 We extend full support to all the self-defensive measures to be taken by the Korean People's Army, the invincible revolutionary armed forces, including a preemptive nuclear strike to defend the country.
					
					 The DPRK's self-defensive measures are in full line with international law.

articles.title: Brazilian Newspaper Lays Bare Unreasonable UNSC's Resolution against DPRK
articles.content:
Brazilian Newspaper Lays Bare Unreasonable UNSC's Resolution against DPRK
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian newspaper Patria Latina carried a commentary on March 16 laying bare the unreasonable UN Security Council's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK.
					 The commentary said:
					
					 The U.S., which has always turned down the DPRK's peace proposals, instigated the UN Security Council to adopt the most outrageous "resolution on sanctions" in a bid to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 Israel and other countries are steadily pushing ahead with their nuclear weaponization programs but sanctions have been imposed upon the DPRK only.
					
					 And a lot of countries launch satellites but only the DPRK's satellite launch is being faulted.
					
					 Through these facts we can understand that the U.S. is going to prevent the countries courting its displeasure from developing the means for self-defence.

articles.title: Brazilian Body Accuses Japanese Authorities of Suppressing Chongryon
articles.content:
Brazilian Body Accuses Japanese Authorities of Suppressing Chongryon
Pyongyang, March 26 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK in a statement on March 20 protested against the Japanese authorities' crackdown upon the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans in Japan.
					 Recently, the Japanese reactionaries are getting undisguised in their suppression of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 This shows that Japan has betrayed its true colors as a brutal and gangster state after throwing away its showy mask of "constitutional state" and "democratic state."
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have never stopped the suppression of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan but got outrageous in doing so.
					
					 The Japanese regime is working hard to lay a springboard for turning Japan into a military giant by taking advantage of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and to undermine Chongryon, a DPRK's legitimate organization of overseas citizens.
					
					 The regime should refrain from politically suppressing Chongryon and abusing the human rights of Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Grupo de inspeccion de CDN rechaza locura conflictiva anti-RPDC de titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
Grupo de inspeccion de CDN rechaza locura conflictiva anti-RPDC de titeres surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 26 de marzo (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que los traidores titeres surcoreanos libraron en el mar, la tierra y el cielo las "ceremonias de enfrentamiento" con motivo del 6o aniversario del incidente del hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan", el portavoz del grupo de inspeccion del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 26 una declaracion.
					Diciendo todavia que el incidente del hundimiento del barco "Cheonan" es la "conducta del Norte", los titeres surcoreanos persiguen la desconfianza, la hostilidad, el enfrentamiento y el choque con la parte connacional. 
					
					La nota lo califica de sofisteria inaceptable, insistencia injusta y provocacion intolerable, y continua:
					
					La verdadera intencion de Park Geun-hye y sus compinches es mantener las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas como las hostiles, conflictivas e irreconciliables. 
					
					No se abandonara nunca el vicio de los traidores surcoreanos que calificaron de "conductas del Norte" todos los incidentes ocurridos en el suelo surcoreano en el tiempo pasado.
					
					Teniendo en consideracion la situacion actual, es intolerable el proceder de la banda de Park Geun-hye que suele armar tales alborotos conflictivos de modo "anual y regular". 
					
					La provocacion extremada provoca indudablemente las contramedidas de justicia. 
					
					El intento de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos de "derrocar el regimen" de la RPDC mediante la brutal "sancion" y las provocaciones militares sin precedentes causara la guerra de venganza demoledor. 
					
					Si ellos siguen enfrascandose en la confrontacion fratricida insistiendo sin escrupulos en que el incidente del hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan" es la "conducta del Norte", toda la extension surcoreana sufrira la tragedia del barco "Cheonan".

articles.title: Artilleria de largo alcance de gran unidad de frente de EPC envia ultimatum a banda de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Artilleria de largo alcance de gran unidad de frente de EPC envia ultimatum a banda de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 26 de marzo (ACNC) -- El disparo simultaneo de la artilleria de largo alcance de la gran unidad combinada del frente del Ejercito Popular de Corea, que convirtio en un instante el supuesto nido enemigo en un mar de fuego, es la explosion de intolerable colera contra los malvados, que se atreven a denigrar la maxima dignidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, y es el inicio de la guerra de venganza implacable para declarar el fin mas tragico a la banda surcoreana de Park Geun-hye.
					La artilleria de largo alcance de gran unidad combinada de frente del EPC envio el dia 26 a la banda de Park Geun-hye el siguiente ultimatum:
					
					1. La traidora Park Geun-hye y su banda deben pedir perdon oficial a toda la nacion en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar por sus tremendos crimenes. 
					
					Nuestro prestigioso Sol del Songun es el simbolo de la vida, el destino y el radiante futuro de toda la nacion coreana. 
					
					El intento atrevido de denigrarlo y eliminarlo resulta el archi-crimen mas imperdonable del mundo. 
					
					La banda de Park debe pedir perdon a toda la nacion. Esto es el ultimo remedio para mantener su sucia vida restante.
					
					2. Park Geun-hye, traidora sin par y sus compinches deben descuartizar despiadadamente ante toda la nacion dandoles de inmediato el castigo mas severo a los criminales sin precedentes que inventaron e intentaron a ejecutar el nefando "golpe a la Direccion Suprema".
					
					Si hay algo que el hombre no debe cometer en el mundo, eso es la locura absurda de atentar al Sol del cielo.
					
					Este delito de traicion no puede excusarse ni eludirse con nada y merece el castigo escalofriante.
					
					Ejecutad oficialmente a los criminales ante todos los coreanos, solo esto sera la oportunidad ultima para que Chongwadae, nido de males, y otros organos de gobernacion reaccionaria puedan evitar la lluvia de fuego del castigo.
					
					3. Si la traidora Park Geun-hye y su banda no aceptan el ultimatum de nuestro ejercito, la artilleria de largo alcance de la gran unidad combinada del frente pasara a la implacable accion militar.
					
					La disculpa y ejecucion oficiales constituyen la ultima advertencia de nuestra artilleria de largo alcance que espera la orden de golpe preventivo demoledor haciendo punteria a Chongwadae y los organos de gobernacion reaccionaria.
					
					Si apretamos ahora mismo el boton de disparo artillero, los nidos enemigos, fuente de todos males y tragedias, se convertiran en cenizas en un abrir y cerrar de ojos.
					
					Sera inutil aunque Park Geun-hye y su banda arman alborotos hablando de la "intensificacion de disposicion de alerta en todo el pais" y convocando la "reunion urgente de los comandantes de operacion".
					
					El unico remedio para salvarse es aceptar con sinceridad el ultimatum de nuestro ejercito.
					
					Ellos no deben olvidar ni un momento que Chongwadae y las instituciones de gobernacion reaccionaria ya estan al alcance de disparo concentrado de la horriblemente indignada artilleria de largo alcance de nuestra gran unidad combinada del frente.
					
					Nuestro ejercito del monte Paektu nunca habla de palabras vacias.

articles.title: Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional revela crimenes de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional revela crimenes de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 26 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Consejo de Reconciliacion Nacional hizo publica el dia 26 una nota de acusacion revelando los imperdonables crimenes antinacionales y antipopulares de Park Geun-hye mediante una parte de sus sobrenombres sucios dados por la opinion publica surcoreana.
					Ahora, en el Sur de Corea esta en moda el que burlan y revelan los malos actos antinacionales y antipopulares de Park Geun-hye cometidos durante su mandato de 3 anos relacionandolos con su nombre, senala la nota y continua:
					
					Por eso, Park Geun-hye, bruja vieja, tiene numerosos nombres sucios que reflejan sus crimenes.
					
					Generalmente, las personas tienen su nombre bautizado por los padres y tambien los apodos y seudonimos. Pero, no pueden encontrarse con sobrenombres tan asquerosos y fastidiados como los de Park Geun-hye.
					
					En cada uno de sus sobrenombres ignominiosos estan concentrados todos sus crimenes imperdonables contra el pais y la nacion y reflejadas el odio, la condena y la colera de la nacion dirigidas a esa traidora vendepatria.
					
					Segun la nota, la poblacion surcoreana le bautizo como Lee Myung-bak Geun-hye porque todo lo que hace ella se asemeja a los quehaceres de Lee que llevo a la ruptura las relaciones intercoreanas. Tambien le puso el mal apodo de Pal Kkun-hae, que significa una vieja de corazon frio que llevo al fracaso las relaciones intercoreanas siempre encolerizandose de subito.   
					
					Al mismo tiempo, ella se llama Pa Kku-ne, que significa una vieja caprichosa cambiando todo con frecuencia si no le agrada, Ppo Kun-hae en el sentido de que los habitantes surcoreanos se sienten cansados ante el poder de ella. Ademas se llama Tak Kku-ne porque ella sigue repitiendo solo la palabra "confrontacion fratricida".  
					
					Tambien le puso el apodo de Kke Kkun-hae calificandola de vieja sucia porque ella, insatisfecha con haber vendido a las fuerzas ajenas su cuerpo y el pais, vende hasta sus connacionales. Tambien, la poblacion surcoreana le llama Toksa (vibora) Geun-hye por su actitud virulenta. Ademas suele llamarle Kae (perra) Geun-hye porque ella prefiere a perro mas que el ser humano, y Ak Geun-hye en el sentido de que le queda solo la rabia nerviosa.

articles.title: FGSC advierte a horda de traidores de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
FGSC advierte a horda de traidores de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 26 de marzo (ACNC) -- En su declaracion fechada 26, el portavoz del Comite Central de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea (FGSC) denuncio severamente en nombre de todos los obreros las provocaciones de los imperialitas yanquis y la banda de traidores de Park Geun-hye que insatisfechos de las imprudentes maniobras de guerra de agresion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, actuan con imprudencia para atentar a la Direccion Suprema de ella.
					La nota subraya que si los enemigos provocan una guerra, los obreros coreanos tomaran en manos el fusil de la revolucion junto con el ejercito poderoso revolucionario del monte Paektu para liberar la parte surena de Corea tras exterminar el nido de la banda de traidores de Park y edificar en toda la extension surcoreana un mundo del pueblo trabajador.
					
					Destaca que el mundo vera claramente como castigan todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo de Corea inclusive los obreros unidos compactamente en torno al destacado genial comandante del Songun a los provocadores que perpetraron los insoportables crimenes contra la maxima dignidad de la RPDC y como saldran victoriosos en la confrontacion con Estados Unidos y la guerra por la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Advierte a los imperialistas yanquis y la banda de traidores de Park, enemigos jurados, que ellos pagaran muy caro por sus crimenes cometidos contra el pueblo coreano.

articles.title: PSDC exhorta a todo el pueblo a defender Direccion Suprema de RPDC
articles.content:
PSDC exhorta a todo el pueblo a defender Direccion Suprema de RPDC
Pyongyang, 26 de marzo (ACNC) -- En su declaracion fechada 26, el portavoz del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea (PSDC) califico las locuras provocativas de los imperialistas norteamericanos y la banda de traidores de Park Geun-hye de climax de la hostilidad mas perversa y diabolica contra la dignidad y el regimen de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y de archi-crimen sin precedente que se atreve a desafiar al Sol de la nacion.
					El documento subraya que no hay en el mundo un pais como la RPDC en que el pueblo venera a su Dirigente como cielo y  este toma como fundamento de la politica servirle con entera disposicion y todos unidos marchan hacia el radiante futuro.
					
					Recuerda que los imperialistas yanquis y los titeres surcoreanos hacen todos los esfuerzos por destruir el mas sagrado y mas precioso sosten del destino del pueblo coreano.
					
					Advierte que si los enemigos dan algun indicio de tiro desacertado contra la RPDC, los provocadores y los nidos de crimenes seran convertidos en cenizas por el golpe preventivo de todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					Enfatiza que todos se movilizaran en la sagrada guerra de todo el pueblo para defender a ultranza al Sol de destino, eliminar a todos los provocadores y lograr sin falta la victoria en la confrontacion con Estados Unidos y la causa historica de la reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju estudia trabajos de Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae y el de Acero Chollima
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju estudia trabajos de Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae y el de Acero Chollima
Pyongyang, 26 de marzo (ACNC) -- El premier de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Pong Ju, analizo en el terreno los trabajos del Complejo Siderurgico de Hwanghae y el de Acero Chollima. 
					En el Hwanghae recorrio varios lugares estimulando a los obreros que baten el record en la produccion de hierro Juche.
					
					En la reunion consultiva dieron enfasis en la necesidad de apoyar con el aumento de produccion de hierro al Comite Central del Partido siguiendo el espiritu de lucha heroica de los obreros de veterana generacion y discutieron los problemas para el respecto. 
					
					El premier visito el de Acero Chollima, donde llamo a aumentar activamente la produccion de acero poniendo de pleno manifiesto el espiritu de autofortalecimiento.

articles.title: Periodicos revelan naturaleza de provocadores a traves de incidente de "Cheonan"
articles.content:
Periodicos revelan naturaleza de provocadores a traves de incidente de "Cheonan"
Pyongyang, 26 de marzo (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 6o aniversario del incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan", la banda titere surcoreana organizo en Taejon un "acto por dia de defensa del Mar Oeste".
					Los periodicos capitalinos publicaron el dia 26 los articulos y comentarios condenando que el susodicho incidente es la atroz provocacion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el caso intrigante de gran tamano sin  precedente inventado por la horda titere surcoreana para impedir la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur, denigrar el prestigio de la RPDC y provocar la guerra de agresion contra esta.
					
					El diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual lo califica de producto del complot premeditado de Estados Unidos y sus lacayos enloquecidos por el enfrentamiento anti-RPDC y prosigue:
					
					El complot y la falsificacion son el modo de existencia de los maniacos conflictivos. Cada vez que ocurrian los incidentes sensacionales en el Sur de Corea, la horda titere recurria a la locura anti-RPDC relacionandolos injustamente con esta.
					
					La naturaleza de los traidores titeres que se entregan a la intriga y la provocacion cuestionando irrazonablemente la RPDC, nunca se cambia ni un minimo tanto hace 6 anos como hoy en dia.
					
					La grave situacion de hoy evidencia que la banda titere hace esfuerzos desesperados por desatar a toda costa la guerra nuclear bajo el amparo de EE.UU. con el fin de realizar su ambicion de agresion a la RPDC.
					
					Por otra parte, el periodico Minju Joson, en un comentario individual, revela que el objetivo de estos agresores y provocadores que abogan tanto por la "resolucion de seguridad popular" so pretexto de la "provocacion" de alguien, reside en encubrir su naturaleza conflictiva e inculcar la locura de agresion a la RPDC entre los soldados y los habitantes surcoreanos para echar a ellos a la guerra fratricida como carne de canon al igual que los muertos en el incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan" y el de fuego artillero en la isla Yonphyong.

articles.title: Tendra lugar Torneo Internacional de Maraton por Premio Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Tendra lugar Torneo Internacional de Maraton por Premio Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, 26 de marzo (ACNC) -- En visperas del Dia del Sol (15 de abril,) cumpleanos del Presidente Kim Il Sung, tendra lugar en esta capital el Torneo Internacional de Maraton por el Premio Mangyongdae.
					Segun el secretario general de la Asociacion de Atletas de Corea, Kang Song Du, el certamen se efectuara el 10 de abril dividido en las competencias de 42.195, 21.0975 y 10. El Estadio Primero de Mayo situado en el islote Rungna sera la sede de las ceremonias de apertura y clausura y la de punto de salida y de llegada.
					
					En la competencia participaran, ademas de los corredores coreanos seleccionados en los juegos de enero y febrero, los atletas y aficionados provenientes de varios paises y regiones.
					
					Los participantes correran repetidamente el tramo de 10 km de circunvalacion que pasa por el puente Rungna, tunel Kumrung, delantera del Arco de Triunfo, tunel Kumrung no.2, puente Chongryu y otros lugares.
					
					El certamen servira de un buen motivo para celebrar el dia de nacimiento del Presidente como fiesta comun de la humanidad, profundizar el sentimiento de amistad entre los deportistas y aficionados de varios paises y desarrollar la tecnologia de maraton.

articles.title: ACNC comenta conducta ridicula de psicopatas
articles.content:
ACNC comenta conducta ridicula de psicopatas
Pyongyang, 26 de marzo (ACNC) -- Estados Unidos cuestionan sin ton ni son el reciente tiro del nuevo lanzacohetes reactivo autopropulsado de grueso calibre de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea como "lanzamiento de misiles de corta distancia" y lo califica de la violacion de la "resolucion" de la ONU.
					Tan pronto como se informara el dia 21 la noticia del tiro de estas armas de nuevo tipo de la RPDC, los titeres surcoreanos picotearon que "el Norte lanzo los misiles de corta distancia".
					
					Tambien, el delegado especial para la politica sobre la RPDC y el vocero para Asia Oriental y el Pacifico del Departamento de Estado norteamericano y el vocero del Pentagono disparatearon uno tras otro que "el lanzamiento de misiles en que se aplico la tecnica de lanzamiento de misiles balisticos deviene la innegable violacion a la resolucion del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU" y "el Norte de Corea debe contenerse en sus actos de agravar la tension y enfocar en tomar las medidas detalladas para observar la promesa y el deber internacionales".
					
					No podemos menos que calificar del trastorno psiquico esa actitud de los enemigos atemorizados ante los sonidos de unos proyectiles.
					
					Ahora, EE.UU. espantado con el gran poderio militar de la RPDC, esta fuera de si.
					
					Cuando la RPDC hizo de publico conocimiento las ojivas nucleares aligeradas, estandarizadas y normalizadas, el presidente del Instituto para Ciencia y Seguridad Internacional de EE.UU. palidecio de asombro diciendo que "el Norte de Corea ya habria tenido la capacidad de la minimizacion de las ojivas nucleares".
					
					Al realizarse el entrenamiento de lanzamiento de cohetes balisticos de las fuerzas estrategicas del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dijo que "la ojiva separada reentro con exito en el atmosfera resistiendo al calor de friccion y se exploto con exito en la altura ya definida."
					
					Y anadio con el extremo terror que "podria crearse en realidad el caos en que debido a la explotacion nuclear en el aire de la Peninsula Coreana se paralizaran todos los sistemas electronicos".
					
					Bajo tales circunstancias, EE.UU. se queda aturdido confundiendo hasta el tiro de lanzacohetes reactivo autopropulsado con el lanzamiento de misiles balisticos, lo cual nos hace recordar el refran: el gato escaldado del agua fria huye.
					
					El hecho de que EE.UU. no distingue el lanzamiento de misiles balisticos del tiro de lanzacohetes reactivo autopropulsado, causa una preocupacion de que por su neurastenia el equivoque el sonido del trueno con la explotacion nuclear.
					
					EE.UU. introdujo con el alma sosegada las armas nucleares estrategicas y tacticas de todo tipo en el Sur de Corea calculando que si mantiene la atroz politica de bloqueo sin precedente, la RPDC no cultivara sus fuerzas.
					
					Pero, la grandiosa detonacion de la bomba de hidrogeno de la RPDC y el manifiesto del poderio de los cohetes balisticos que superan la imaginacion, convirtieron en espuma la ilusion absurda del imperio yanqui y en chatarra las preciosas armas emplazadas en el Sur de Corea.
					
					Especialmente, a EE.UU. le dio la gran pesadilla el emplazamiento del magnifico sistema de las armas arriba mencionadas del Ejercito Popular de Corea que tiene gran efectividad y significacion estrategica en el trabajo para fortalecer considerablemente la capacidad de ataque de exactitud contra los objetos enemigos de la zona de operacion de la parte surcoreana. 
					
					Tales conductas ridiculas de trastorno psicopata de EE.UU. parten precisamente del temor morbido sobre la RPDC.
					
					Si EE.UU. tiene tanto miedo a la RPDC, deberia retirar todos los pertrechos militares introducidos en el Sur de Corea y sus tropas y cesar los ejercicios militares conjuntos del caracter agresivo.
					
					Por mucho que haga esfuerzos desesperados por buscar otra receta dando persistentemente la espalda a este simple metodo de tratamiento del trastorno psicopata y fobia, no podra evitar la burla y el vituperio de todo el mundo, sino le tocara solo el destino de autodestruccion.
					
					No tenemos nada que ver con el trastorno psiquico de EE.UU., pero no podemos tolerar los actos de el que, preso del veto constitucional, nos cuestiona injustamente.
					
					En la Peninsula Coreana EE.UU. libra el entrenamiento de guerra nuclear para agredir la RPDC abandonando hasta el rotulo "anual" y "defensivo" y mostrando abiertamente su intencion de atacar la maxima dignidad y regimen de ella, razon por la cual, en la escena internacional va prevaleciendo la opinion en que EE.UU. es autor de la agravacion de tension.
					
					Apresurado por esta situacion, EE.UU. se vale de todos los medios para calumniar la RPDC movilizando a todos sus lacayos en todas las ocasiones en que la RPDC tomaba las contramedidas militares.
					
					La intencion de EE.UU. es acusar de manera continua e intencional la RPDC para imputarle la responsabilidad de la agravacion de la tension en la Peninsula Coreana y tildarle del "quebrantador de ley internacional".
					
					Las recientes medidas de accion de la RPDC devienen las merecidas de autodefensa tomadas frente a las maniobras de EE.UU. que libra sucesivamente las locuras militares contra la Direccion de la Revolucion Coreana movilizando las fuerzas armadas agresoras y los bienes estrategicos de gran tamano sin precedente en la historia.
					
					El imperio yanqui no puede tildar con nada de los actos ilegales las medidas de intransigencia redoblada anti-EE.UU. de la RPDC tomadas para defender la soberania y el derecho a la existencia del pais y la nacion ni encubrir su naturaleza criminal. 
					
					Mientras EE.UU. no abandone la amenaza y chantaje nucleares y la politica hostil contra la RPDC, esta redoblara mas y mas las medidas autodefensivas para enfrentarse con ello.
